headline: Financial Program Specialist at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement

defaultPosition.description: Remains responsible for providing support for managing the internal tracking systems and processes for compiling and aggregating data as well as measures use to track the success of the Balanced Workforce Program. Prepares briefings, presentations, and conferences to executive management and policy officials. Provides support in the planning and submission of data, including forming the basis for cost analyses and developing program resource requests and decisions. Provides project management and analytical support for various projects detailing workforce management initiatives.
defaultPosition.title: Financial Program Specialist

positions.description: Remains responsible for providing support for managing the internal tracking systems and processes for compiling and aggregating data as well as measures use to track the success of the Balanced Workforce Program. Prepares briefings, presentations, and conferences to executive management and policy officials. Provides support in the planning and submission of data, including forming the basis for cost analyses and developing program resource requests and decisions. Provides project management and analytical support for various projects detailing workforce management initiatives.
positions.title: Financial Program Specialist

positions.description: Assisted with Sponsor Accounts and Special Programs, coordinated communication and payments to the University through foreign embassies and universities. Maintained support and customer services for office and student needs. Tracked and updated data in Excel spreadsheets on foreign student accounts. Updated and retrieved data through University software, Datatel, in order to bill student sponsors and maintain balanced accounts
positions.title: Student Accounts Assistant

positions.companyName: Executive Office of the President, Office of Administration
positions.description: Provided research assistance and data entry for various workforce management inquiries. Drafted and edited official documents and forms. Coordinated and presented findings to managers, specialists, and directors.
positions.title: Intern
